CustomField.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Suppress_Collections__c, ""), OR(Max_Overdue_Due_Date_Merge__c - 3 = Today(), Days_Past_Due__c = 7, Days_Past_Due__c = 15, Days_Past_Due__c = 30, Days_Past_Due__c = 45, Days_Past_Due__c = 60, Days_Past_Due__c = 67, Days_Past_Due__c = 74, Days_Past_Due__c = 81, Days_Past_Due__c = 88, Days_Past_Due__c = 90) )
CustomField.label: Collection Email To Fire Today
